key.name: continue
key.description: Continue flipping to next workspace if mouse cursor stays on a reactive edge.

key.name: enable-vertical
key.description: Flip through the workspaces vertically (enable reactive edges at top and bottom of the screen).

key.name: enable-horizontal
key.description: Flip through the workspaces horizontally (enable reactive edges at left and right of the screen).

key.name: delay-timeout
key.description: The delay timeout between hitting a reactive edge with the cursor and the actual workspace flipping in milliseconds.

key.name: offset
key.summary: Offset to screen border in percent.
key.description: In order not to switch workspaces unwantedly, the reactive edge doesn't trigger near the other screen border by this offset.

key.name: size
key.summary: Size of reactive edge in pixels.
key.description: The size of the reactive edge in pixels.

key.name: opacity
key.description: The opacity of the reactive edge. 0 means transparent, 255 fully visible.
